_sText:
EDIT KEY ON THE LAST SUB WAS BROKEN SO I RE-RELEASED AS THIS ONE. Been working on this map for a fair while now, trying to get it perfect. I think it turned out pretty well. This map is created for low gravity just like Scoutzknivez (Tested on gravity 220, and airaccelerate 470) Thanks to ultrAslan for many of the ideas he gave me to put into this map. Thanks to Nosoul for a lot of help in fixing it up from my previous release And thanks to Tyrantar for the idea of more props / detail. From previous release I have: 1.) Added more props / cover / detail 2.) Removed some cubemaps and placed them more effectively, reducing the random white glows, and overall making it look better 3.) Added decals instead of those shitty brushes using decal textures 4.) Added a light in the middle room And probably a bit more I've forgotten to mention. The main focus of this map is strafing, just like what SK kind of turned into, however, this one has more cover so those people that can't strafe still stand a great chance. Players can use the many props to help give a more exciting strafing experience. I actually had quite a good time strafing alone on it, xD.
Currently In cycle on: 208.100.14.232:27015 208.167.232.72:27015
Please let me know when you add this map to your servers so I may add it to the list! This is for all you SK fans out there, so don't forget to fav it!!
